message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you get 40%. We can negotiate further if you want.
Let's try 55% for me, 45% for you. The money is losing value, we should hurry!
I'm willing to go down a bit, but I need more than 45%.  5250 for me, 4750 for you.  Let's end this before the money becomes worthless!
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, but I need a bit more. 52% for me, 48% for you. The money is really losing value now!
